texts.biography: Strib is a controversial spirit about the vigor of the forest. Main defender of a cold and static existence, he avoids coexistence with other leaders, while he secretly joins his private forces.
texts.name: Strib

specialty.description: Casts Ice Bolt with damage increased by 5% for every n hero levels (n - target creature level).
specialty.name: Cold
